name: Superman3275
body:
### About Me
I'm a Software Engineer who programs games in my spare time. Currently, I'm using python + pygame in side projects, and Python / C in development.

```
$ ls
superman3275.py
languages.txt
frameworks.txt
$ cat superman3275.py
import pygame
pygame.init()
screen = pygame.display.set_mode((640, 480))
while True:
    screen.fill((0, 0, 0)) # My favorite color
    pygame.display.update()
$ cat languages.txt
C++
C
Java
Python
$ cat frameworks.txt
SFML
XGoogle
PySpeech
Pygame
Requests
```

### Hiring
I am open for part-time work! Shoot me an email at superman3275@gmail.com. I live in central texas (DFW). Be warned - currently, hiring me might require special accommodations. Fear not, young padawan: I'm sure we can work these out!

### What I've Made
I've made multiple projects in both C++ and Python. Right now I'm working on Hooded - a 2D Platformer RPG-ish Game!

### People I've Got to Give Thanks To
My Parents.
Mark Pedroza.

### Contact Me!
My email is: superman3275@gmail.com!
You can talk to me on irc with the server irc.freenode.net on the channel ##dreamincode.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
